mapper.select: select a.order_id, a.wxmember_redpackage_id, a.wxmember_tihuojuan_idstr, a.actual_money, a.wxmember_id, b.now_integral as before_integral, sum(a.actual_money+b.now_integral) as now_integral from tb_order a left join tb_wxmember_wealth b on b.wxmember_id=a.wxmember_id where a.order_id=#{order_id}

select a.order_id, a.looknumber, a.allmoney, a.discount_money, a.wxmember_redpackage_id, a.wxmember_tihuojuan_idstr, a.actual_money, a.use_integral, a.use_wx, a.order_status, a.send_integral, a.serial_number, a.order_type, a.reserve_arrival_time, a.reserve_day, a.delivery_time, a.delivery_fee, a.createtime, a.overtime, a.wxmember_id, a.wxmember_address_id, c.contacts, c.contacts_number, c.corporate_name, c.floor_numbe, d.address_name from tb_order a left join tb_wxmember b on a.wxmember_id=b.wxmember_id left join tb_wxmember_address c on a.wxmember_id=c.wxmember_id left join tb_address d on c.address_id=d.address_id where a.order_id=#{order_id}

select group_concat(a.order_id) as orderstr from tb_order_lunch a left join tb_lunch b on a.lunch_id=b.lunch_id left join tb_order c on a.order_id=c.order_id where b.lunch_name like concat(concat('%',#{lunch_name}),'%') and c.order_status=#{order_status}
select a.order_id, a.shop_number, b.lunch_name from tb_order_lunch a left join tb_lunch b on a.lunch_id=b.lunch_id where a.order_id=#{order_id}

select a.order_id, a.looknumber, a.allmoney, a.discount_money, a.wxmember_redpackage_id, a.wxmember_tihuojuan_idstr, a.actual_money, a.use_integral, a.use_wx, a.order_status, a.send_integral, a.serial_number, a.order_type, a.reserve_arrival_time, a.reserve_day, a.delivery_time, a.delivery_fee, a.createtime, a.overtime, a.wxmember_id, a.wxmember_address_id, c.contacts, c.contacts_number, c.corporate_name, c.floor_numbe, d.address_name from tb_order a left join tb_wxmember b on a.wxmember_id=b.wxmember_id left join tb_wxmember_address c on a.wxmember_id=c.wxmember_id left join tb_address d on c.address_id=d.address_id where

select a.order_id, a.looknumber, a.allmoney, a.order_status, a.order_type, a.delivery_status, a.delivery_operator_name, date_format(a.createtime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createtime, date_format(a.jiedantime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as jiedantime, date_format(a.createtime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as overtime, a.wxmember_id, c.contacts, c.contacts_number, c.address_id, d.address_name from tb_order a left join tb_wxmember b on a.wxmember_id=b.wxmember_id left join tb_wxmember_address c on a.wxmember_id=c.wxmember_id left join tb_address d on c.address_id=d.address_id where
order by a.createtime desc

select a.order_id, a.looknumber, a.allmoney, a.order_status, a.order_type, a.createtime, a.overtime, a.wxmember_id, c.contacts, c.contacts_number, c.address_id, d.address_name from tb_order a left join tb_wxmember b on a.wxmember_id=b.wxmember_id left join tb_wxmember_address c on a.wxmember_id=c.wxmember_id left join tb_address d on c.address_id=d.address_id where
order by a.createtime desc

select sum(a.allmoney) as allallmoney, sum(a.discount_money) as alldiscount_money, sum(a.actual_money) as allactual_money, sum(a.use_integral) as alluse_integral, sum(a.use_wx) as alluse_wx, sum(a.send_integral) as allsend_integral, count(*) as allordernumber from tb_order a left join tb_wxmember b on a.wxmember_id=b.wxmember_id left join tb_wxmember_address c on a.wxmember_id=c.wxmember_id left join tb_address d on c.address_id=d.address_id where
order by a.createtime desc
